title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Online Mathematics Instructional Design Capability Enhancement Based on the ADDIE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Mathematics educational CALL content can be designed by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation).
A smartphone-optimized mathematics activity module can be developed based on learner analysis.
A prototype can be created to improve online mathematics instructional materials by incorporating formative assessment results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
